subject: RE: Re: CABLE PROBLEME GT2
description_text:
Envoyé depuis l'application Mail Orange ---------------- De : "service@simsonn.com" <service@simsonn.com> Envoyé : mardi 05 août 2025 14:33 À : lodoroma@orange.fr Objet : Re: CABLE PROBLEME GT2 Hi Dominique CASTEL, What issue are you experiencing with the GT2 steering wheel cable? Please provide a photo, and we can arrange to send you a new one free of charge. On
 Tue, 5 Aug at 7:50 AM , Dominique CASTEL <lodoroma@orange.fr> wrote: Hello, I am a customer of yours and have a GT2 hub and Pro X pedals. I am very satisfied with my equipment, and I plan to get an H and sequential gearbox soon. However, I have a problem with the cable that connects my steering wheel to the PC. I can therefore no longer use my equipment. I would like you to inform me about the cable and give me a reference so that I can order quickly. I would like to point out that this request has already been made to you via WhatsApp, and I have not received a response. So please help me. Thank you. 2324:4206036

conversations.body_text: Hi Dominique CASTEL,  I didn’t notice any obvious issues with this wire. Is it broken? Please provide a clear photo showing the break point so we can verify.
